forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 11C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 52F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies this evening will become partly cloudy after midnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
